homepage.intro: Hello, my name is Artur Marbach and i live in Hamburg. As a front-end developer with extensive experience in JavaScript and Angular, I have successfully demonstrated my technical skills and problem-solving abilities in numerous projects.
Enthusiasm: Through my analytical thinking and solid experience with modern frameworks, I find creative solutions to complex challenges and effectively bring new ideas to life.
Commitment: I have participated in several group projects, gaining valuable experience in collaborative software development.
Skill Development: My enhanced frontend skills in design and usability now enable me to develop complex web applications.
Portfolio: Explore a selection of my projects here - interact with the applications, test their features, and view the live code to see my skills in action.
development1.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories
development3.description: This app is a Slack clone. It simplifies team communication and collaboration with its intuitive user interface, real-time messaging, and a freely selectable variety of channels.
development2.description: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on a object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and bottles to fight against the killer chicken
Communication: Contact me throug this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
